title: egghead.io
description: I‚Äôve worked on egghead for the past 5 years of my career. I‚Äôve helped build out our HATEOAS API using Ruby on Rails to do so. I‚Äôve worked with integrating many different services such as Stripe, Convertkit and Transloadit.

title: GraphQL Course
description: I teamed up with the egghead.io production team to produce this GraphQL course. I take the learner from very little GraphQL knowledge to using mutations and subscriptions to build a real time messaging application.

title: Remix Course
description: I produced a Remix course with egghead. I paired up with a voice coach to enhance my recording and script writing skills. This course goes over how to set up a SaaS project with authentication, a data store, and a Remix Server.
